WRITING.TITLE: A subreddit with discussion provoking questions. (Examples inside)
WRITING.TEXT:
Stuff like:
* Would you rather know when you're gonna die or how?
* If you could pause time once, what would you do while time is frozen?
* What superpower would be the most useful?
I know of subs like /r/wouldyourather, but I'm looking for one filled with questions like the ones above.
If it contains NSFW questions that's even better.
Example of NSFW question:
If your mom and girlfriend switched bodies and you have to fuck one of them for things to get back to normal, who would you choose?
Things that would get downvoted in /r/askreddit basically lol

To get current gold players, you can either:
* buy a gold pack if you're looking for any gold player
* buy a team pack if you're looking for someone specific, like OKC pack for KD (still have to be lucky though)
* get 3 stars against a team in domination and hope that the 3 star pack gives you a gold player. It'll always give you at least a silver one though.
To get historic gold players, you will have to purchase the historic packs. To get MJ, buy the historic pack series 1, and just hope you get lucky. MJ isn't a collection reward so it'll be less of a grind.
Edit: Also there are some tournaments you can play to get some good players. You can get ruby Harden if you have 8 Rockets players on your team. Or you can go for ruby Curry if there's no PG on your squad. Finally there's a ruby Scottie Pippen tournament. That one's online only though, so be prepared.
You can turn off retweets for a certain user, seeing as Ronnie and LD2K get a boner every time someone tweets them their MyTeam lineup or some shit lol

I'm a 6' athletic PG drafted #8 by the Pistons.
My sig skills are: Posterizer Highlight film Shot creator Pick pocket Lebron coast to coast Pick amp; roll maestro Alley ooper
I'm a pretty decent player but I play on rookie casual just for the hell of it haha, just because it's easier to get around people and it seems you posterize more often. Also I don't even need finisher or deadeye since every shot is A+. It's fun for me. Also you can literally reach in and get a steal at least every other possession.
I finished my first season and we won the championship. Haven't played with that file since.
The lack of a source says it all about this post.

If you're serious about buying a team, I would assume you'd be sticking to that MyGM for more than 20 seasons. There's a glitch I have encountered 4 times, as have everyone else from what I've read, where when you get to 2032-2033, the file will be corrupt and you won't be able to advance.

I did until they cracked a first joke about him still pretending he was dead... I think it was when they said they should split his channel's revenue into the 3 of them now that he's dead.
But then I realized they wouldn't have recorded a show at all if it were true. haha

WRITING.TEXT: Like the ones here: http://m.imgur.com/a/BZpmm

My favourite team is Chicago and it was because I liked watching Rose mostly. Now it's thanks to Noah, and hell, everyone else on the team. They play with such heart.
My flair says the Raptors. I am a Raptors fan also but that's just because I live in Canada and gotta support the only team we got lol. I don't even live in Ontario sadly, but go Raps.

Yeah it's a great song, but not part of my favourites from the album. I notice I always go back to Jesus Walks, Last Call and Spaceship whenever I wanna kick back and listen to some College Dropout.
My go-to Kanye song right now is Drive Slow. Such a nice beat to listen to when you drive on empty streets after a night out.

Little backstory. When I was 16-17 (2 years ago) I fell into a deep depression because I got rejected by my best friend, girl I liked so much I imagine it was scary.
I used to only listen to pop songs like Lady Gaga, Maroon 5, Pitbull, etc. A friend made me listen to Swimming Pools by Kdot, fell in love with it.
I've only listened to rap ever since. My whole library is 90% rap. I liked it because the tone is almost always aggressive, assertive and whatnot. It's how I got over her. It just happened instantly, after like a year of sadness.
Picked up on Kanye eventually. I thought MBDTF was my favourite album ever.
And then he released Yeezus...
This could potentially be easily fixable. Any details? Does the power button not to anything at all, or does computer refuse to advance past the startup screen?
Michael Jordan, Trail Blazers

Well, it's near the end of my 9-day March break. I go back to school after tomorrow. I've had a lot of shit to do. A lot
Sadly, I haven't even opened up my backpack, neither have I logged in to my school's account to check teachers' emails, documents, or just important notes.
I just have no motivation for this last semester before I start university. I'm not even sad/depressed. I'm very happy all the time. Any advice? lol I love you guys in /r/nba
You don't have to max them out. Just be a good dunker before you play him.

Hold square (PS4) or X (X1) when he goes in for a rebound like that.
I think it's broken though. I do it all the time. I shit you not, never have I ever seen a missed putback. A point guard surrounded by 7' players will always putback if he goes for it. I feel dirty whenever I putback online; I never miss them and no one else knows how it seems. Free 2 points.
No. I'm on Xbox One, but if I had gotten a PS4, you better believe I would've used that $10 code that comes with it on VC.

You make a good point, but there are two sides to it, still.
And if it ever costs VC to call timeouts, even if it's in 2k31, I will wire you $200 of 2014 value.

She pulled me over, asked for my license and registration. She told me about my points and that I'll have to pay a fine. We said goodnight and went our separate ways. All she gave me back were my license and registration.
My parents are telling me she was supposed to give me a physical ticket with $160 written on it that we would take to the bank.
I live in Canada if it matters lol

WRITING.TITLE: I got pulled over by a cop because I ran a yellow light. She told me I'll have to pay a fine of $160, but never gave me a ticket. What do I do now?
WRITING.TEXT: I now have 3 of 4 allotted points on my license. I'm gonna be nervous whenever I drive now.

WRITING.TITLE: MyPlayer suddenly won't dunk anymore. Dunk/vertical maxed out and I have dunk packages on him. Help?
WRITING.TEXT: Even when I'm holding turbo he'll just do a layup.

WRITING.TITLE: My friends look at me like I'm a douchebag whenever I mention clubs, bars, alcohol, etc.
WRITING.TEXT:
They're not the type to go out clubbing, get drinks and whatnot. They prefer movie nights, video game nights, board games, etc. This doesn't really bother me because I have a good time with them. I like them.
Yesterday, we went to the movies. After the movie, we were chilling in my car and one of them said we should do something tomorrow night (tonight).
I asked them collectively: "You guys wanna go to XYZ?"
"What's that?"
"It's a really nice club, makes for a good time."
Then one of them gave me sort of a dirty look and replied sarcastically. One of them said they'll text me the next day saying if they're down or not, which basically means "I don't wanna blow you off now, so I'll say no tomorrow."
I have other friends I could go with, that's not the issue.
We're 18-19 years of age.
It's all part of the script. You'll start when you're about 30-35 games into the season

WRITING.TITLE: [Nest-Gen] Is there a way to play MyGM with a custom roster AND 14 games a season?
WRITING.TEXT:
When you first create a MyGM, there are two menus. One that has quarter length, injuries, custom roster and all, and another menu that lets you customize the league, like number of games, the divisions, etc.
When I change options in the first and go back to the second to change the number of games, it switches the changes I made in the first menu back to default... so I use the 2K roster. Is there any way to fix this?

WRITING.TEXT:

That being said, I don't follow any team particularly closely.

My favourite is good team packs vs. silver packs. For example:
Heat pack: 22,500 MT or 10,000 VC
Silver pack: 27,000 MT or... 6000 VC
More MyTeam points but less VC, lol

He wanted 80+ million for 4 years. For one year I could only offer him 3 mil haha. He said no but I gave him the win ring pitch so he could sign.

WRITING.TITLE: My sister has just been diagnosed with anorexia and refuses to eat most of the time.
WRITING.TEXT:
She never eats when we're supposed to. Say we're having dinner at 6. She doesn't eat at 6. She'll get a bit hungry at 8, with such small portions.
We also found out she's been sticking her finger down her throat to puke intentionally for the past year. At the beginning, it was 4 times a week. For the past 6 months, she says twice a week.
She's stopped for the past week though. I'm still very worried, she's only 17. I don't know what information to provide. If you want any, tell me. I'll be here all day.
Which roster?
Yeah I've seen you around on this sub and your rosters look sweet. I'm on Xbox One though :(
